title: The benefite that Christians receiue by Iesus Christ crucifyed. Translated out of French into English, by A.G. 1573
author: Benedetto, da Mantova, fl. 1534-1541.
publisher: [By Thomas East,] for Lucas Harison and George Bishop,
notes: By Benedetto da Mantova; revised by Marco Antonio Flaminio.
Sometimes attributed, erroneously, to Antonio dalla Paglia [i.e. Aonio Paleario].
Originally published as: Dal beneficio di Christo.
Running title reads: The benefyte of Christes death.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
